title: CTN Processing Time
body:
Dear customer,

The processing time for a Cargo Tracking Note (CTN) is typically between 24 to 48 hours after your payment has been confirmed. The exact time can vary depending on the payment method used.

If you have any further questions, please let us know.

Best regards,
Support Team

title: Payment Methods
body:
Dear customer,

We accept the following payment methods:

- Bank Transfer
- Allinpay
- Stripe

Please choose the one that is most convenient for you. Instructions are provided when you generate a payment link.

Best regards,
Support Team

title: Fees
body:
Dear customer,

Our current fee structure is as follows:

- CTN Fee: $100 per container
- Service Fee: $100 per container

This amounts to a total of $200 per container. Please note that this pricing is for Bill of Lading (ocean freight) and may differ for Air Waybills.

Best regards,
Support Team

title: How do I get a copy of my invoice?
body:
Dear customer,

You can request a copy of your invoice by replying to this email or by logging into your account on our portal. If you need assistance, please provide your B/L or CTN number.

Best regards,
Support Team

title: How do I track the status of my CTN?
body:
Dear customer,

To check the status of your Cargo Tracking Note (CTN), please provide your B/L or CTN number. We will update you as soon as possible.

Best regards,
Support Team

title: What documents do I need to provide for CTN processing?
body:
Dear customer,

For CTN processing, please provide the following documents:
- Bill of Lading (B/L)
- Commercial Invoice
- Packing List
- Any other relevant shipping documents

If you have already submitted these, no further action is needed.

Best regards,
Support Team

title: How do I upload my bank transfer receipt?
body:
Dear customer,

You can upload your bank transfer receipt by replying to this email with the receipt attached. Our team will process your payment as soon as it is received.

Best regards,
Support Team

title: Can I get a refund or cancel my CTN?
body:
Dear customer,

Refunds or cancellations are handled on a case-by-case basis. Please provide your B/L or CTN number and the reason for your request, and our team will review your case.

Best regards,
Support Team

title: What is the difference between CTN and B/L?
body:
Dear customer,

A Bill of Lading (B/L) is a shipping document issued by the carrier, while a Cargo Tracking Note (CTN) is a regulatory document required by certain countries for cargo tracking and compliance. Both are important for your shipment.

Best regards,
Support Team

title: What are your business hours?
body:
Dear customer,

Our business hours are Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM (local time). We aim to respond to all enquiries within one business day.

Best regards,
Support Team

title: How do I contact support?
body:
Dear customer,

You can contact our support team by replying to this email or calling our hotline at [your phone number]. We are here to help!

Best regards,
Support Team

title: Can I pay in a different currency?
body:
Dear customer,

Currently, we accept payments in USD. If you wish to pay in another currency, please contact us in advance to discuss available options.

Best regards,
Support Team

title: How do I update my company/contact information?
body:
Dear customer,

To update your company or contact information, please reply to this email with the new details, or update your profile in our online portal.

Best regards,
Support Team
